description: General description of the biological material, e.g. cell line
title: Biosource

___cell_line.description: Ontology term for the cell line used.
___cell_line.title: Cell Line Name

___override_biosource_name.description: A override name for the biosource that can be used as the biosource_name in place of the automatically generated one
___override_biosource_name.title: Biosource Name Override

___SOP_cell_line.description: Standard operation protocol for the cell line as determined by 4DN Cells Working Group
___SOP_cell_line.title: SOP for the Cell Line

___tissue.description: Anatomy (UBERON) Ontology term for the tissue used.
___tissue.title: Tissue Name

___description.description: A plain text description of the biosource.
___description.title: Description

___url.description: An external resource with additional information about the biosource.
___url.title: URL

___modifications.description: Expression or targeting vectors stably transfected to generate Crispr'ed or other genomic modification
___modifications.title: Stable Genomic Modifications

items.description: A single stable genomic modification of the biosource.
items.title: Modifications

___biosource_vendor.description: The Lab or Vendor that provided the biosource.
___biosource_vendor.title: Biosource Vendor

___individual.description: Source of the biological material, donor.
___individual.comment: See Individual sheet or collection for existing items
___individual.title: Individual
